sentences.en: ‘Do you reckon Margot will be there?’ ‘ Definitely not .’
sentences.cn: “你估计玛戈会在那里吗？” “肯定不会。”

sentences.en: "I think the earlier ones are a lot better." —"Mm, definitely."
sentences.cn: “我觉得早前的那些要好得多。”——“嗯，毫无疑问。”

sentences.en: Acting is definitely a young person's profession in many ways.
sentences.cn: 从许多方面来说，表演无疑是吃青春饭的行当。

sentences.en: Before the game we were definitely the underdogs.
sentences.cn: 我们在赛前绝对不被看好。

sentences.en: But this site is definitely worth bookmarking.
sentences.cn: 但这个网址肯定值得放进书签里。

sentences.en: He was definitely a bit of an odd bod.
His opponents believe he is definitely on the run.
I can state quite definitely it will be terrible.
sentences.cn: 我可以非常明确地说，情况会十分糟糕。

sentences.en: I'm definitely interested, but I'll have to run it by Larry Estes.
sentences.cn: 我很有兴趣，但是我还得告诉拉里·埃斯蒂斯一声。

sentences.en: I've definitely been bitten by the gardening bug.
Italy were definitely a better side than Germany.
sentences.cn: 意大利队明显比德国队要强。

sentences.en: She seemed nervous or tense, and she was definitely short with me.
sentences.cn: 她似乎很焦虑，抑或是很紧张，对我明显很不客气。

sentences.en: The hotel fitness centre is definitely worth a visit.
sentences.cn: 这家酒店的健身中心绝对值得一去。

sentences.en: The recession is definitely at an end.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退无疑已经告终。

sentences.en: The tactics the police are now to employ are definitely uncompromising.
sentences.cn: 警方目前即将采取的策略明显很强硬。

sentences.en: Their treatment of staff is definitely not cricket.
sentences.cn: 他们对待员工的方式绝对不公正。

sentences.en: We definitely wanted to salvage some pride for British tennis.
sentences.cn: 我们当然想为英国网球挽回一些尊严。

words.tran_cn: 可下定义的；可确定的；可限定的
有定义的，确定的；清晰的，轮廓分明的
最典型的；起决定性作用的
决定性的；最后的；限定的
确定性，定指；明确；清晰度；梅性
定义；[物] 清晰度；解说
使明确；给...下定义；使...的轮廓分明（define的过去分词）
规定（define的ing形式）；给…下定义；表明特征
清楚地，当然；明确地，肯定地
